articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Audi drops Daniel Abt for using ringer during virtual Formula E race - The Verge
articles.description: Formula E driver Daniel Abt is no longer on the Audi team after he had a pro sim racing driver compete for him during a virtual event this weekend. Abt says he thought the idea would be funny and that he wasn’t trying to surreptitiously get a better result.
articles.content:
Formula Es Daniel Abt says he was just trying to be funny
